item.description:
Opening Night of The Claflin Hill Symphony Orchestra
Enjoy a professional symphony without going to Boston!

Dinner 5:45 pm
Concert: 7:30 pm

Heroic Soul Music
Music of Richard Strauss & Hector Berlioz

Check out comments from the last one...

We have arranged a very special deal with Claflin Hill to get almost 50% off the regular ticket price. Cost is only $20 per person. (Regular price is $35) You may pay when you arrive.

Dinner Details
5:45 pm meet at the Town Hall parking lot on the corner of Court and Main Streets to walk over to the Turtle Tavern (affordable pub, located at 72 Main Street). If you arrive after 5:45, meet us there. It's just one block up on the same side of the street as the Town Hall.

Skipping Dinner? Meet Us There Details
7:15 pm go to the ticket booth, buy your ticket for $20, and tell them you're with Jacki Rose's meetup group. Find your seat and we will be there. Seats are assigned and we are all together.

If you need to contact me the night of the show, my cell# is 508-381-1529
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Town Hall parking lot at 5:45 on Court Street.
item.name: Dinner and Symphony in Milford
